channel.title: Farming Mod bug
channel.description:
Hi There,
I happened to use 2 days ago the farming mod and found a bug (I think) on the composter. I could not get any fluid coming out of it. It appear to me there is a problem with the exit pipe. It looks like designed for entry not exit.
Please help Thanks

item.title: Farming Mod bug
item.dc:creator: @Ahmed_Ezzat Ahmed Ezzat
item.description:
@Ahmed_Ezzat wrote:

A pity, Farming Mod is quite a good change for cooling your mind and alternative for not constructing all the time.

Read full topic
